snippet: Berlin hopes the disclosures will provide leverage in its effort to fight international financial systems that make it easy for the wealthy to hide their money.
abstract: German officials hope leak of information about tens of thousands of offshore accounts set up by German banks will provide leverage in effort to combat tax evasion.
lead_paragraph: Berlin hopes the disclosures will provide leverage in its effort to fight international financial systems that make it easy for the wealthy to hide their money.
